channel.title: kdee.co.za
channel.description: my portfolio site ... my little corner where i can play and just hang out.

item.title: Tonplaygo
item.description:
AUG
2015

Tonplaygo

Tonplaygo is a free mobile entertainment and gaming platform, built around a tangible connection to fashion and high-tech brands.

Android, iOS App & website.

nuts & bolts:

AngularJS, HTML(5), CSS, JQuery, Cordova, X-Code, Gulp

my role:

  • UI/UX consulting
  • Development team lead
  • Frontend development & implementation
  • Play & App Store submissions
PRE
SENT

2011

Old Mutual

colmex and greenlight uk

Old Mutual Life Products launched in South America, and the Greenlight Project intended for the UK.

microsoft MVC (ASP.NET), with HTML frontend

2012

item.title: Capitec

JAN
2011

Capitec Bank

Global One Project

2011
